CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two different types of photovoltaic devices were fabricated and characterized , with the device structures of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al and ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| TiO x |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| TiO x |

These entities are clearly identified as materials in the paragraph. ITO, PEDOT : PSS, polymer, PC71BM, LiF, Al, and TiO x are all materials mentioned in the paragraph and used in the fabrication and characterization of the photovoltaic devices.
